content:
The Dataverse action seems to be broken at the moment. When pinging the native API, there seems to be no response and a 404 code. Opened issue #11.

Do you have an idea how to resolve this? I suspect it may be related to the unstable image. @Ellen K had a similar issue in Mexico.
@Jan Range yes, I just put this in the issue, but I hope the fix at https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse-frontend/pull/333 will help.
Great, thanks for the info! Is or will there be a stable image which we can use for the action as a default?

You could switch to the "alpha" image. 6.1, currently. Whatever the latest release is. That's what we use in the compose file linked from https://preview.guides.gdcc.io/en/develop/container/running/demo.html
@Oliver Bertuch shall we merge the PR or do you have concerns?
Sry can't take a look right now... I'm terraforming infrastructure.
No worries, isn't urgent :smile:
